reviews.review_content: The whole series of architecture is great, it makes an impression after folding.
Great LEGO bricks. Many elements are movable, everything is refined and aesthetic. I really recommend it.
Super set with super two models. A large number of blocks. Detail and mapping at the highest level. The son is pleased.

offers: LEGO Architecture Paris - explore and recreate the most beautiful cities in the world.
